name: Innovation Ventures, LLC v. Liquid Manufacturing, LLC
name_abbreviation: Innovation Ventures, LLC v. Liquid Manufacturing, LLC

parties: Innovation Ventures, LLC v Liquid Manufacturing, LLC,

opinions.text: The parties shall include among the issues to be briefed whether the Nondisclosure Agreement and Equipment Manufacturing Agreement are void due to failure of consideration, and whether the non-compete provisions in the Termination Agreement and the Nondisclosure Agreement are enforceable.

casebody.head_matter:
Leave to Appeal Granted July 1, 2015:
Innovation Ventures, LLC v Liquid Manufacturing, LLC,
No. 150591; Court of Appeals No. 315519.
